subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Berglund had a goal and two assists and the St. Louis Blues moved a step closer to a playoff spot with a 5-2 victory over the host Columbus Blue Jackets on Sunday.
snippet: Patrik Berglund had a goal and two assists and the St. Louis Blues moved a step closer to a playoff spot with a 5-2 victory over the host Columbus Blue Jackets on Sunday.
